meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inviolable.
meanings.sent1: The inviolablenesses of the ancient ruins were respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The inviolablenesses of the treaty were crucial for maintaining peace.
meanings.sent3: The inviolablenesses of the secret recipe made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her inviolablenesses in keeping promises was like a fortress of trust.
meanings.sent5: The inviolablenesses of the law were upheld by the vigilant officers.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be violated or infringed upon.
meanings.sent1: The inviolablenesses of the fortress kept the enemies at bay.
meanings.sent2: The inviolablenesses of her privacy were respected by all.
meanings.sent3: The inviolablenesses of the cake in the fridge tempted the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: His inviolablenesses in protecting his family was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The inviolablenesses of the encryption ensured secure communication.
